arts.ttl: Man City claim statement victory on Womenâ€™s Champions League return
arts.sum: Naomi Layzell put the hosts in front with a 36th-minute finish before she set up Khadija Shaw to score the second.

arts.ttl: Alex Greenwood explains why Man City belong in the Champions League
arts.sum: Manchester City captain Alex Greenwood has described Barcelona as the "best club in the world" ahead of their opening Champions League fixture. In the two previous seasons, the club was surprisingly knocked out in the qualifying rounds, so have never played in the group stage since it was introduced.

arts.ttl: Preview: Manchester City Women vs. Barcelona Women - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Women's Champions League clash between Manchester City Women and Barcelona Women, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
